Write a book report on *Algorithms of Oppression: How search engines reinforce Racism* by Safiya Noble. Provide a summary of the book, an write a brief analysis in supporting or opposing the book, and a personal reaction of the book.

Report guidelines

-   3-4 Pages

-   Must include a title page

-   Double Spaced

-   12 point font

-   Proofread your work

-   Submit a pdf of your work to Canvas

-   Due 12/2/2022
